string-array.name: hintQuestionsArray
string-array.item: Who was your favorite teacher in School?
What was the first company I have worked for?
What was the first book I have read?
In what city did you meet your spouse/significant other?
What is the name of your favorite childhood friend?
In what city or town was your first job?
In which city did I got married?
Where were you when you had your first kiss?
